LayoutConstants, AbstractUIHandler, AbstractUIProgressHandler, ExtendedUIProgressHandler, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class ExtendedInstallPanel
extends InstallPanel
implements ExtendedUIProgressHandler

The install panel class. Launches the actual installation job with extensions for custom actions.

Author:
Klaus Bartz
